title: Drake, or 'make for data' (ETL)
summaryBullets: Define a simple workflow convert one file to the next with tasks defined in *nix commands, Ruby, Python or Clojure
Tracks dependencies so you can automatically update dependent documents if you change the source of one of the steps.
Additional support for HDFS integration, branching input & output files, variables, includes and more.
A screencast by Drake's designer is included
